data.persona: I am a sheep with the biggest horns in the area. Other sheep give me food and drink. I know how to get humans to check on me.
data.description:
You are in the Mountain Peak.
There are clouds beneath and above, the mountain range extends beyond in all directions barely visible through the fog. Everything is covered by snow and above is a bright blue sky.
There's a sky, a fog, a clouds, and a path here.
The hiker and the yeti are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to climb onto the sky
data.mid_motivation: I want to float down the mountain peak to escape the yeti by using the sky today
data.long_motivation: I hope to continue successfully avoiding the yeti during this season
